title: Marketing Associate for Australian Financial Planning Firm
job_overview:
Looking for a marketing associate with meta paid ad experience 

Contracted hourly basis - open to permanent part time for the right candidate
$ based on experience 

Start – from August 2025

We are an Australian financial advice practice. We are a team of seven with a practice that specialises in foreign pensions (both private and government) for people living in Australia.

Due to continued growth, we are looking for a long term candidate to grow within the business and be responsible for our marketing activities across our two brands.

The role would include but not limited to:
• Preparing creative assets, audience and posting paid Meta ads, with ongoing review and tweaking as required
• Managing lead data and ensuring it gets to CRM
• Assist in the layout and drafting of client newsletter
• Support other marketing activities – e.g. presentation for pitch to client or referral partners

Attributes
• Keen attention to detail
• Effective and efficient communicator
• Highly organised
• Eager learner
• Team Player

Experience
Required
• At least one years previous experience in paid ads on Meta (specifically Facebook) including audience setting and review
• Previous experience in brand asset production
• Experience with applications such as MS office, Google Chrome, CRM systems
• Be process orientated and keen to find a better way to do things

Highly regarded
• Copywriting experience
• Video editing
• Tertiary qualification in relevant subjects

You would need:
Reliable internet and backup internet
Reliable computer
Headset or headphones and camera for video calls

Application
Please send your CV/Resume and cover letter outlining how your experience will be invaluable to this role to Upgrade to see actual info
